articles.content: Oil futures posted a second gain on Tuesday, with traders betting that fuel demand will strengthen in the U.S. and Europe, as the market heads into the summer travel season. "From here on out the thi… [+505 chars]

articles.author: Naomi O’Leary
articles.title: Amazon pays no corporation tax in Europe despite €44bn sales - The Irish Times
articles.description: EU Commission will ‘continue to monitor Amazon’s behaviour’ on corporate taxation
articles.content:
Online retailer Amazon paid no corporation tax on its operations in Europe in 2020 despite enjoying record sales income of 43.8 billion, according to corporate filings seen by The Irish Times.
